alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Leake County through 415 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carthage, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carthage and Redwater around 345 PM CDT. Singleton around 405 PM CDT. Renfroe around 410 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
